abstract: Scotiabank, the Canadian financial firm, said it would take a 20 percent stake in China’s Bank of Guangzhou for roughly $723 million.
snippet: Scotiabank, the Canadian financial firm, said it would take a 20 percent stake in China’s Bank of Guangzhou for roughly $723 million.
lead_paragraph: Scotiabank, the Canadian financial firm, announced on Friday that it would buy a 20 percent stake in China’s Bank of Guangzhou for roughly $723 million.

headline.main: Scotiabank to Buy 20% Stake in Bank of Guangzhou
